means: 剥夺继承权，剥夺特权( disinherit的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: But his own children were disinherited.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自己的子女是不许继承的.

sentence.Network_en: Any one of these partners would have disinherited his son on the question of rebuilding Tellson's.
sentence.Network_cn: 若是有哪位董事的孩子打算改建台尔森银行,他就会被剥夺了继承权.

sentence.Network_en: Hart's good - bad man was always an outsider, always one of the disinherited.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈特扮演的被误认为坏人的好人总是一个局外人, 一个被剥夺继承权的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: where a testamentary successor is disinherited ;, 遗嘱继承人丧失继承权的;
the comparative study on foreign disinherited system ., 外国继承权丧失制度比较研究.

and that no man shall be disinherited , nor put out of his franchises or freehold , unless he be duly brought to answer , and be forejudged by course of law ;任何人不得被剥夺财产继承权，也不得取消其免税权利或自由拥有财产的权利，除非经过恰当的质询，依法律程序作出未经审判的裁决；
always one of the disinherited ,, 总是一个被剥夺继承权的人.

disingenuouslydisingenuousness disinherit 失继承权disinheritance disintegrate 分解分裂分化瓦解破裂崩溃粉碎分.

entry.def: If you disinherit someone such as your son or daughter, you arrange that they will not become the owner of your money and property after your death, usually because they have done something that you do not approve of.

example.ex: He threatened to disinherit her if she refused to obey.
example.tran: 他威胁说如果她拒绝服从就剥夺她的继承权。

auth_sentence.content: His older brother, David, apparently disinherited himself.
auth_sentence.res_content: His older brother, David, apparently disinherited himself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His older brother, David, apparently disinherited himself.

auth_sentence.content: Enraged, he disinherited her and sentenced her to banishment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Enraged, he disinherited her and sentenced her to banishment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Enraged, he disinherited her and sentenced her to banishment.

auth_sentence.content: Soon afterward, Didi Sohus disinherited her beloved son, perhaps after being convinced he had abandoned her.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Soon afterward, Didi Sohus disinherited her beloved son, perhaps after being convinced he had abandoned her.
